001package squidpony.squidai;
002
003import squidpony.squidgrid.FOV;
004import squidpony.squidgrid.Measurement;
005import squidpony.squidgrid.Radius;
006import squidpony.squidgrid.Spill;
007import squidpony.squidmath.*;
008
009import java.io.Serializable;
010import java.util.ArrayList;
011import java.util.Arrays;
012import java.util.Collection;
013
014import static squidpony.squidgrid.Measurement.*;
015
016/**
017 * An AOE type that has a center and a volume, and will randomly expand in all directions until it reaches volume or
018 * cannot expand further. Specify the RadiusType as Radius.DIAMOND for Manhattan distance (and the best results),
019 * RADIUS.SQUARE for Chebyshev, or RADIUS.CIRCLE for Euclidean. You can specify a seed for the RNG and a fresh RNG will
020 * be used for all random expansion; the RNG will reset to the specified seed after each generation so the same
021 * CloudAOE can be used in different places by just changing the center. You can cause the CloudAOE to not reset after
022 * generating each time by using setExpanding(true) and cause it to reset after the next generation by setting it back
023 * to the default of false. If expanding is true, then multiple calls to findArea with the same center and larger
024 * volumes will produce more solid clumps of affected area with fewer gaps, and can be spaced out over multiple calls.
025 * <br>
026 * This will produce doubles for its {@link #findArea()} method which are equal to 1.0.
027 *
028 * This class uses {@link squidpony.squidgrid.Spill} to create its area of effect.
029 * Created by Tommy Ettinger on 7/13/2015.
030 */
031public class CloudAOE implements AOE, Serializable {
032    private static final long serialVersionUID = 2L;
033    private Spill spill;
034    private Coord center, origin = null;
035    private int volume;
036    private long seed;
037    private boolean expanding;
038    private Radius rt;
039    private Reach reach = new Reach(1, 1, Radius.SQUARE, AimLimit.FREE);
040    private char[][] dungeon;
041
042    public CloudAOE(Coord center, int volume, Radius radiusType)
043    {
044        GWTRNG rng = new GWTRNG();
045        seed = rng.getState();
046        spill = new Spill(rng);
047        this.center = center;
048        this.volume = volume;
049        expanding = false;
050        rt = radiusType;
051        switch (radiusType)
052        {
053            case SPHERE:
054            case CIRCLE:
055                spill.measurement = EUCLIDEAN;
056                break;
057            case CUBE:
058            case SQUARE:
059                spill.measurement = CHEBYSHEV;
060                break;
061            default:
062                spill.measurement = MANHATTAN;
063                break;
064        }
065    }
066
067    public CloudAOE(Coord center, int volume, Radius radiusType, int minRange, int maxRange)
068    {
069        GWTRNG rng = new GWTRNG();
070        seed = rng.getState();
071        spill = new Spill(rng);
072        this.center = center;
073        this.volume = volume;
074        expanding = false;
075        rt = radiusType;
076        reach.minDistance = minRange;
077        reach.maxDistance = maxRange;
078        switch (radiusType)
079        {
080            case SPHERE:
081            case CIRCLE:
082                spill.measurement = EUCLIDEAN;
083                break;
084            case CUBE:
085            case SQUARE:
086                spill.measurement = CHEBYSHEV;
087                break;
088            default:
089                spill.measurement = MANHATTAN;
090                break;
091        }
092    }
093    public CloudAOE(Coord center, int volume, Radius radiusType, long rngSeed)
094    {
095        seed = rngSeed;
096        spill = new Spill(new GWTRNG(rngSeed));
097        this.center = center;
098        this.volume = volume;
099        expanding = false;
100        rt = radiusType;
101        switch (radiusType)
102        {
103            case SPHERE:
104            case CIRCLE:
105                spill.measurement = EUCLIDEAN;
106                break;
107            case CUBE:
108            case SQUARE:
109                spill.measurement = CHEBYSHEV;
110                break;
111            default:
112                spill.measurement = MANHATTAN;
113                break;
114        }
115    }
116    public CloudAOE(Coord center, int volume, Radius radiusType, long rngSeed, int minRange, int maxRange)
117    {
118        seed = rngSeed;
119        spill = new Spill(new GWTRNG(rngSeed));
120        this.center = center;
121        this.volume = volume;
122        expanding = false;
123        rt = radiusType;
124        switch (radiusType)
125        {
126            case SPHERE:
127            case CIRCLE:
128                spill.measurement = EUCLIDEAN;
129                break;
130            case CUBE:
131            case SQUARE:
132                spill.measurement = CHEBYSHEV;
133                break;
134            default:
135                spill.measurement = MANHATTAN;
136                break;
137        }
138        reach.minDistance = minRange;
139        reach.maxDistance = maxRange;
140    }
141
142    public Coord getCenter() {
143        return center;
144    }
145
146    public void setCenter(Coord center) {
147
148        if (dungeon != null && center.isWithin(dungeon.length, dungeon[0].length) &&
149                AreaUtils.verifyReach(reach, origin, center))
150        {
151            this.center = center;
152        }
153    }
154
155    public int getVolume() {
156        return volume;
157    }
158
159    public void setVolume(int volume) {
160        this.volume = volume;
161    }
162
163    public Radius getRadiusType() {
164        return rt;
165    }
166
167    public void setRadiusType(Radius radiusType) {
168        rt = radiusType;
169        switch (radiusType)
170        {
171            case SPHERE:
172            case CIRCLE:
173                break;
174            case CUBE:
175            case SQUARE:
176                break;
177            default:
178                break;
179        }
180    }
181
182    @Override
183    public void shift(Coord aim) {
184        setCenter(aim);
185    }
186
187    @Override
188    public boolean mayContainTarget(Collection<Coord> targets) {
189        for (Coord p : targets)
190        {
191            if(rt.radius(center.x, center.y, p.x, p.y) <= Math.sqrt(volume) * 0.75)
192                return true;
193        }
194        return false;
195    }
196
197    @Override
198    public OrderedMap<Coord, ArrayList<Coord>> idealLocations(Collection<Coord> targets, Collection<Coord> requiredExclusions) {
199        if(targets == null)
200            return new OrderedMap<>();
201        if(requiredExclusions == null) requiredExclusions = new OrderedSet<>();
202
203        //requiredExclusions.remove(origin);
204        int totalTargets = targets.size();
205        OrderedMap<Coord, ArrayList<Coord>> bestPoints = new OrderedMap<>(totalTargets * 8);
206
207        if(totalTargets == 0 || volume <= 0)
208            return bestPoints;
209
210        if(volume == 1)
211        {
212            for(Coord p : targets)
213            {
214                ArrayList<Coord> ap = new ArrayList<>();
215                ap.add(p);
216                bestPoints.put(p, ap);
217            }
218            return bestPoints;
219        }
220        Coord[] ts = targets.toArray(new Coord[targets.size()]);
221        Coord[] exs = requiredExclusions.toArray(new Coord[requiredExclusions.size()]);
222        Coord t;
223
224        double[][][] compositeMap = new double[ts.length][dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
225
226        Spill sp;
227
228        char[][] dungeonCopy = new char[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
229        for (int i = 0; i < dungeon.length; i++) {
230            System.arraycopy(dungeon[i], 0, dungeonCopy[i], 0, dungeon[i].length);
231        }
232
233        Coord tempPt;
234        for (int i = 0; i < exs.length; ++i) {
235            t = exs[i];
236            sp = new Spill(dungeon, spill.measurement);
237            sp.rng.setState(seed);
238
239            sp.start(t, volume, null);
240            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
241                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
242                    tempPt = Coord.get(x, y);
243                    dungeonCopy[x][y] = (sp.spillMap[x][y] || !AreaUtils.verifyReach(reach, origin, tempPt)) ? '!' : dungeonCopy[x][y];
244                }
245            }
246        }
247
248        Measurement dmm = Measurement.MANHATTAN;
249        if(spill.measurement == CHEBYSHEV) dmm = Measurement.CHEBYSHEV;
250        else if(spill.measurement == EUCLIDEAN) dmm = Measurement.EUCLIDEAN;
251
252        double radius = Math.sqrt(volume) * 0.75;
253
254        for (int i = 0; i < ts.length; ++i) {
255            DijkstraMap dm = new DijkstraMap(dungeon, dmm);
256
257            t = ts[i];
258            sp = new Spill(dungeon, spill.measurement);
259            sp.rng.setState(seed);
260
261            sp.start(t, volume, null);
262
263            double dist = 0.0;
264            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
265                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
266                    if (sp.spillMap[x][y]){
267                        dist = reach.metric.radius(origin.x, origin.y, x, y);
268                        if(dist <= reach.maxDistance + radius && dist >= reach.minDistance - radius)
269                            compositeMap[i][x][y] = dm.physicalMap[x][y];
270                        else
271                            compositeMap[i][x][y] = DijkstraMap.WALL;
272                    }
273                    else compositeMap[i][x][y] = DijkstraMap.WALL;
274                }
275            }
276            if(compositeMap[i][ts[i].x][ts[i].y] > DijkstraMap.FLOOR)
277            {
278                for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
279                    Arrays.fill(compositeMap[i][x], 99999.0);
280                }
281                continue;
282            }
283
284            dm.initialize(compositeMap[i]);
285            dm.setGoal(t);
286            dm.scan(null, null);
287            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
288                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
289                    compositeMap[i][x][y] = (dm.gradientMap[x][y] < DijkstraMap.FLOOR  && dungeonCopy[x][y] != '!') ? dm.gradientMap[x][y] : 99999.0;
290                }
291            }
292            dm.resetMap();
293            dm.clearGoals();
294        }
295        double bestQuality = 99999 * ts.length;
296        double[][] qualityMap = new double[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
297        for (int x = 0; x < qualityMap.length; x++) {
298            for (int y = 0; y < qualityMap[x].length; y++) {
299                qualityMap[x][y] = 0.0;
300                long bits = 0;
301                for (int i = 0; i < ts.length; ++i) {
302                    qualityMap[x][y] += compositeMap[i][x][y];
303                    if(compositeMap[i][x][y] < 99999.0 && i < 63)
304                        bits |= 1 << i;
305                }
306                if(qualityMap[x][y] < bestQuality)
307                {
308                    ArrayList<Coord> ap = new ArrayList<>();
309
310                    for (int i = 0; i < ts.length && i < 63; ++i) {
311                        if((bits & (1 << i)) != 0)
312                            ap.add(ts[i]);
313                    }
314
315                    if(ap.size() > 0) {
316                        bestQuality = qualityMap[x][y];
317                        bestPoints.clear();
318                        bestPoints.put(Coord.get(x, y), ap);
319                    }
320                }
321                else if(qualityMap[x][y] == bestQuality)
322                {
323                    ArrayList<Coord> ap = new ArrayList<>();
324
325                    for (int i = 0; i < ts.length && i < 63; ++i) {
326                        if((bits & (1 << i)) != 0)
327                            ap.add(ts[i]);
328                    }
329
330                    if (ap.size() > 0) {
331                        bestPoints.put(Coord.get(x, y), ap);
332                    }
333                }
334            }
335        }
336
337        return bestPoints;
338    }
339
340    @Override
341    public OrderedMap<Coord, ArrayList<Coord>> idealLocations(Collection<Coord> priorityTargets, Collection<Coord> lesserTargets, Collection<Coord> requiredExclusions) {
342        if(priorityTargets == null)
343            return idealLocations(lesserTargets, requiredExclusions);
344        if(requiredExclusions == null) requiredExclusions = new OrderedSet<>();
345
346        //requiredExclusions.remove(origin);
347
348        int totalTargets = priorityTargets.size() + lesserTargets.size();
349        OrderedMap<Coord, ArrayList<Coord>> bestPoints = new OrderedMap<>(totalTargets * 8);
350
351        if(totalTargets == 0 || volume <= 0)
352            return bestPoints;
353
354        if(volume == 1)
355        {
356            for(Coord p : priorityTargets)
357            {
358                ArrayList<Coord> ap = new ArrayList<>();
359                ap.add(p);
360                bestPoints.put(p, ap);
361            }
362            return bestPoints;
363        }
364        Coord[] pts = priorityTargets.toArray(new Coord[priorityTargets.size()]);
365        Coord[] lts = lesserTargets.toArray(new Coord[lesserTargets.size()]);
366        Coord[] exs = requiredExclusions.toArray(new Coord[requiredExclusions.size()]);
367        Coord t;
368
369        double[][][] compositeMap = new double[totalTargets][dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
370        Spill sp;
371
372        char[][] dungeonCopy = new char[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length],
373                dungeonPriorities = new char[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
374        for (int i = 0; i < dungeon.length; i++) {
375            System.arraycopy(dungeon[i], 0, dungeonCopy[i], 0, dungeon[i].length);
376            Arrays.fill(dungeonPriorities[i], '#');
377        }
378        Coord tempPt = Coord.get(0, 0);
379        for (int i = 0; i < exs.length; ++i) {
380            t = exs[i];
381            sp = new Spill(dungeon, spill.measurement);
382            sp.rng.setState(seed);
383
384            sp.start(t, volume, null);
385            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
386                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
387                    tempPt = Coord.get(x, y);
388                    dungeonCopy[x][y] = (sp.spillMap[x][y] || !AreaUtils.verifyReach(reach, origin, tempPt)) ? '!' : dungeonCopy[x][y];
389                }
390            }
391        }
392
393        t = pts[0];
394
395        Measurement dmm = Measurement.MANHATTAN;
396        if(spill.measurement == CHEBYSHEV) dmm = Measurement.CHEBYSHEV;
397        else if(spill.measurement == EUCLIDEAN) dmm = Measurement.EUCLIDEAN;
398
399        double radius = Math.sqrt(volume) * 0.75;
400
401        for (int i = 0; i < pts.length; ++i) {
402            DijkstraMap dm = new DijkstraMap(dungeon, dmm);
403
404            t = pts[i];
405            sp = new Spill(dungeon, spill.measurement);
406            sp.rng.setState(seed);
407
408            sp.start(t, volume, null);
409
410
411
412            double dist = 0.0;
413            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
414                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
415                    if (sp.spillMap[x][y]){
416                        dist = reach.metric.radius(origin.x, origin.y, x, y);
417                        if(dist <= reach.maxDistance + radius && dist >= reach.minDistance - radius) {
418                            compositeMap[i][x][y] = dm.physicalMap[x][y];
419                            dungeonPriorities[x][y] = dungeon[x][y];
420                        }
421                        else
422                            compositeMap[i][x][y] = DijkstraMap.WALL;
423                    }
424                    else compositeMap[i][x][y] = DijkstraMap.WALL;
425                }
426            }
427            if(compositeMap[i][pts[i].x][pts[i].y] > DijkstraMap.FLOOR)
428            {
429                for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
430                    Arrays.fill(compositeMap[i][x], 399999.0);
431                }
432                continue;
433            }
434
435
436            dm.initialize(compositeMap[i]);
437            dm.setGoal(t);
438            dm.scan(null, null);
439            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
440                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
441                    compositeMap[i][x][y] = (dm.gradientMap[x][y] < DijkstraMap.FLOOR  && dungeonCopy[x][y] != '!') ? dm.gradientMap[x][y] : 399999.0;
442                }
443            }
444            dm.resetMap();
445            dm.clearGoals();
446        }
447
448        t = lts[0];
449
450        for (int i = pts.length; i < totalTargets; ++i) {
451            DijkstraMap dm = new DijkstraMap(dungeon, dmm);
452
453            t = lts[i - pts.length];
454            sp = new Spill(dungeon, spill.measurement);
455            sp.rng.setState(seed);
456
457            sp.start(t, volume, null);
458
459
460            double dist = 0.0;
461            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
462                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
463                    if (sp.spillMap[x][y]){
464                        dist = reach.metric.radius(origin.x, origin.y, x, y);
465                        if(dist <= reach.maxDistance + radius && dist >= reach.minDistance - radius)
466                            compositeMap[i][x][y] = dm.physicalMap[x][y];
467                        else
468                            compositeMap[i][x][y] = DijkstraMap.WALL;
469                    }
470                    else compositeMap[i][x][y] = DijkstraMap.WALL;
471                }
472            }
473            if(compositeMap[i][lts[i - pts.length].x][lts[i - pts.length].y] > DijkstraMap.FLOOR)
474            {
475                for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++)
476                {
477                    Arrays.fill(compositeMap[i][x], 99999.0);
478                }
479                continue;
480            }
481
482
483            dm.initialize(compositeMap[i]);
484            dm.setGoal(t);
485            dm.scan(null, null);
486            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
487                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
488                    compositeMap[i][x][y] = (dm.gradientMap[x][y] < DijkstraMap.FLOOR  && dungeonCopy[x][y] != '!' && dungeonPriorities[x][y] != '#') ? dm.gradientMap[x][y] : 99999.0;
489                }
490            }
491            dm.resetMap();
492            dm.clearGoals();
493        }
494        double bestQuality = 99999 * lts.length + 399999 * pts.length;
495        double[][] qualityMap = new double[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
496        for (int x = 0; x < qualityMap.length; x++) {
497            for (int y = 0; y < qualityMap[x].length; y++) {
498                qualityMap[x][y] = 0.0;
499                long pbits = 0, lbits = 0;
500                for (int i = 0; i < pts.length; ++i) {
501                    qualityMap[x][y] += compositeMap[i][x][y];
502                    if(compositeMap[i][x][y] < 399999.0 && i < 63)
503                        pbits |= 1 << i;
504                }
505                for (int i = pts.length; i < totalTargets; ++i) {
506                    qualityMap[x][y] += compositeMap[i][x][y];
507                    if(compositeMap[i][x][y] < 99999.0 && i < 63)
508                        lbits |= 1 << i;
509                }
510                if(qualityMap[x][y] < bestQuality)
511                {
512                    ArrayList<Coord> ap = new ArrayList<>();
513
514                    for (int i = 0; i < pts.length && i < 63; ++i) {
515                        if((pbits & (1 << i)) != 0)
516                            ap.add(pts[i]);
517                    }
518                    for (int i = pts.length; i < totalTargets && i < 63; ++i) {
519                        if((lbits & (1 << i)) != 0)
520                            ap.add(lts[i - pts.length]);
521                    }
522
523                    if(ap.size() > 0) {
524                        bestQuality = qualityMap[x][y];
525                        bestPoints.clear();
526                        bestPoints.put(Coord.get(x, y), ap);
527                    }
528                }
529                else if(qualityMap[x][y] == bestQuality)
530                {
531                    ArrayList<Coord> ap = new ArrayList<>();
532
533                    for (int i = 0; i < pts.length && i < 63; ++i) {
534                        if((pbits & (1 << i)) != 0)
535                            ap.add(pts[i]);
536                    }
537                    for (int i = pts.length; i < totalTargets && i < 63; ++i) {
538                        if ((pbits & (1 << i)) != 0) {
539                            ap.add(pts[i]);
540                            ap.add(pts[i]);
541                            ap.add(pts[i]);
542                            ap.add(pts[i]);
543                        }
544                    }
545
546                    if (ap.size() > 0) {
547                        bestPoints.put(Coord.get(x, y), ap);
548                    }
549                }
550            }
551        }
552
553        return bestPoints;
554    }

558    @Override
559    public ArrayList<ArrayList<Coord>> idealLocations(Set<Coord> targets, Set<Coord> requiredExclusions) {
560        int totalTargets = targets.size() + 1;
561        int radius = Math.max(1, (int) (Math.sqrt(volume) * 1.5));
562        ArrayList<ArrayList<Coord>> locs = new ArrayList<ArrayList<Coord>>(totalTargets);
563
564        for(int i = 0; i < totalTargets; i++)
565        {
566            locs.add(new ArrayList<Coord>(volume));
567        }
568        if(totalTargets == 1)
569            return locs;
570        double ctr = 0;
571        if(radius < 1)
572        {
573            locs.get(totalTargets - 2).addAll(targets);
574            return locs;
575        }
576        double tempRad;
577        boolean[][] tested = new boolean[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
578        for (int x = 1; x < dungeon.length - 1; x += radius) {
579            BY_POINT:
580            for (int y = 1; y < dungeon[x].length - 1; y += radius) {
581                for(Coord ex : requiredExclusions)
582                {
583                    if(rt.radius(x, y, ex.x, ex.y) <= radius * 0.75)

585                }

587                for(Coord tgt : targets)
588                {

590                    if(tempRad < radius)
591                        ctr += 1.0 - (tempRad / radius) * 0.5;
592                }
593                if(ctr >= 1)
594                    locs.get((int)(totalTargets - ctr)).add(Coord.get(x, y));
595            }
596        }
597        Coord it;
598        for(int t = 0; t < totalTargets - 1; t++)
599        {
600            if(locs.get(t).size() > 0) {
601                int numPoints = locs.get(t).size();
602                for (int i = 0; i < numPoints; i++) {
603                    it = locs.get(t).get(i);
604                    for (int x = Math.max(1, it.x - radius / 2); x < it.x + (radius + 1) / 2 && x < dungeon.length - 1; x++) {
605                        BY_POINT:
606                        for (int y = Math.max(1, it.y - radius / 2); y <= it.y + (radius - 1) / 2 && y < dungeon[0].length - 1; y++)
607                        {
608                            if(tested[x][y])
609                                continue;
610                            tested[x][y] = true;
611
612                            for(Coord ex : requiredExclusions)
613                            {
614                                if(rt.radius(x, y, ex.x, ex.y) <= radius * 0.75)
615                                    continue BY_POINT;
616                            }
617
618                            ctr = 0;
619                            for(Coord tgt : targets)
620                            {
621                                tempRad = rt.radius(x, y, tgt.x, tgt.y);
622                                if(tempRad < radius)
623                                    ctr += 1.0 - (tempRad / radius) * 0.5;
624                            }
625                            if(ctr >= 1)
626                                locs.get((int)(totalTargets - ctr)).add(Coord.get(x, y));
627                        }
628                    }
629                }
630            }
631        }
632        return locs;
633    }
634*/
635
636    @Override
637    public void setMap(char[][] map) {
638        spill.initialize(map);
639        dungeon = map;
640    }
641
642    @Override
643    public OrderedMap<Coord, Double> findArea() {
644        spill.start(center, volume, null);
645        OrderedMap<Coord, Double> r = AreaUtils.arrayToHashMap(spill.spillMap);
646        if(!expanding)
647        {
648            spill.reset();
649            spill.rng.setState(seed);
650        }
651        return r;
652    }
653
654    @Override
655    public Coord getOrigin() {
656        return origin;
657    }
658
659    @Override
660    public void setOrigin(Coord origin) {
661        this.origin = origin;
662
663    }
664
665    @Override
666    public AimLimit getLimitType() {
667        return reach.limit;
668    }
669
670    @Override
671    public int getMinRange() {
672        return reach.minDistance;
673    }
674
675    @Override
676    public int getMaxRange() {
677        return reach.maxDistance;
678    }
679
680    @Override
681    public Radius getMetric() {
682        return reach.metric;
683    }
684
685    /**
686     * Gets the same values returned by getLimitType(), getMinRange(), getMaxRange(), and getMetric() bundled into one
687     * Reach object.
688     *
689     * @return a non-null Reach object.
690     */
691    @Override
692    public Reach getReach() {
693        return reach;
694    }
695
696    @Override
697    public void setLimitType(AimLimit limitType) {
698        reach.limit = limitType;
699
700    }
701
702    @Override
703    public void setMinRange(int minRange) {
704        reach.minDistance = minRange;
705    }
706
707    @Override
708    public void setMaxRange(int maxRange) {
709        reach.maxDistance = maxRange;
710
711    }
712
713    @Override
714    public void setMetric(Radius metric) {
715        reach.metric = metric;
716    }
717
718    /**
719     * Sets the same values as setLimitType(), setMinRange(), setMaxRange(), and setMetric() using one Reach object.
720     *
721     * @param reach a non-null Reach object.
722     */
723    @Override
724    public void setReach(Reach reach) {
725        if(reach != null)
726            this.reach = reach;
727    }
728
729    public boolean isExpanding() {
730        return expanding;
731    }
732
733    public void setExpanding(boolean expanding) {
734        this.expanding = expanding;
735    }
736
737    /**
738     * Unused because FOVCache rarely provides a speed boost and usually does the opposite. The implementation for this
739     * method should be a no-op.
740     * @param cache an FOV that could be an FOVCache for the current level; can be null to stop using the cache
741     * @deprecated AOE doesn't really benefit from using an FOVCache
742     */
743    @Override
744    @Deprecated
745    public void setCache(FOV cache) {
746
747    }
748}
